titleStmt.title: A copy of the petition delivered to the King at Newark, in His Majesties passage to York, by divers of the inhabitants of the county of Lincoln.

notesStmt.note: The petition presents regrets for misunderstandings fostered bewteen Parliament and the King by the Popish party. Prays for a reunion and that the King would reside near Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
